main event: A bright, silvery, circular object was observed hovering in the sky in Pennsylvania on April 1, 1967.
interesting points: The object was approximately 30-40 feet in diameter and hovered about 300-500 feet above the ground for 15-20 minutes., Several witnesses reported that the object emitted a humming sound., The object ascended vertically before disappearing from sight., The sighting was reported to local police immediately., There was a similar sighting by CAP members in 1965.
witness description: Witness was a 54-year-old male, associated with the Civil Air Patrol.
